author: Jade Bremner
title: Woman Opens Empty House to Medical Staff As a Safe Place to Rest Between Tending to Coronavirus Patients
description: Las Vegas healthcare workers can stay for free in a donated property to keep their families safe from COVID-19.
content:
In a great act of kindness, one Las Vegas woman has donated her empty house to hospital workers, so they can rest for free in between looking after those suffering from COVID-19.
While treating COVID-19 patients, many medical workers are spending time away f… [+5248 chars]
